title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5607.4 - Marketing restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5607.4 - Marketing restrictions

State Regulations
(a) Marketing or advertising as gambling prohibited. A registrant
shall not market or advertise such registrant's platforms as gambling in the

State of New York. (b) Embedded keywords. A registrant shall not use misleading
embedded keywords or similar methods in its platform to
(1)
attract minors, self-excluded contestants
or persons who are or may be problem gamblers; or
(2)
accomplish any other misleading or
deceptive purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5607.4

Adopted

New

York State Register October 18, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
